backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all data types (User, Post, Event, Notification, etc.) and backend logic for a community platform including authorization, blob storage, user approval, posts, events, tenures, and notifications.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two features (registration flow fix and admin member removal fix) to their relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key bug fixes applied to each component, page, hook, or utility.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, sidebar, chart colors, etc.).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the AnthroVerse frontend app, mounting the React app at the `#root` div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all app routes, handles authentication state via Internet Identity, and conditionally renders the login page, profile setup modal, or the main layout based on auth and profile status.
frontend/src/components/admin/RoleAssign: Admin panel listing approved non-root users with per-user role selectors, allowing admins to assign roles from a predefined set with loading and error feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/TenureMana: Admin dialog for starting a new organizational tenure by selecting President, Vice President, and Secretary-Treasurer from approved users and a semester period, with a warning that all elevated roles will be reset.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky app header component with a sidebar toggle, notification bell with unread badge, and a dropdown listing recent notifications with mark-as-read behavior.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Renders the collapsible application sidebar with navigation links (Feed, Events, Chapter Growth, Admin), user profile display, role badge, and logout functionality, with visibility gated by user role permissions.
Provides a full-screen auth page layout with a background image, overlay, logo, and a card container for child auth forms.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginForm.t: Renders a login form that triggers Internet Identity authentication via a single button, showing a loading state and error messages.
Multi-step signup form that first connects via Internet Identity, then collects name, email, and optional profile picture before registering the user on-chain.
frontend/src/components/auth/WaitingForA: Empty file, likely a placeholder component for displaying a waiting-for-approval state after signup.
frontend/src/components/chapter-growth/G: Displays a category-filtered post feed for a named private group, with support for creating, liking, approving, and deleting posts based on user role.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React class component that catches rendering errors and displays a user-friendly error screen with a refresh button, showing error details in development mode.
frontend/src/components/events/CreateEve: Form component for creating a new event with title, description, date/time, optional banner image, and an optional registration limit.
frontend/src/components/events/EventCard: Displays a single event card with banner, title, description, date, and a registration button that tracks and updates registration status.
frontend/src/components/feed/CreatePostF: Form for submitting a new post with text content, an optional image, and a category selector filtered by the user's role permissions.
frontend/src/components/feed/PendingAppr: Displays a card listing pending posts with approve and delete actions, showing loading skeletons and toast notifications for success/failure.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Renders a single post with like, approve, delete, and comment functionality, conditionally showing controls based on user role and authorship.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostFilters: Provides category tab filters, a 'My Posts' toggle, and a search input for filtering the post feed by category or author name.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainLayou: Main authenticated layout wrapping the app with a sidebar, sticky header containing a notification bell with unread badge, and a user dropdown menu with logout.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Simple animated spinner component with configurable size (sm/md/lg) used as a loading indicator throughout the app.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Bell icon button that shows an unread count badge and toggles a NotificationPanel dropdown, marking notifications as read on open.
Renders a single notification row with a type-specific icon, message, timestamp, and an unread indicator dot.
Dropdown panel displaying a scrollable, timestamp-sorted list of NotificationItems or an empty state when there are no notifications.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a single post with author info, category, like/comment interactions, and role-gated actions (approve, delete), including an inline comment thread toggle.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Full-screen onboarding form that collects a new user's name and email to register their profile, with special detection for the root admin email.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedSection: Wrapper component that conditionally renders children only if the current user's role is in the provided allowedRoles list, otherwise rendering an optional fallback.
frontend/src/components/RoleBadge.tsx: Small presentational component that renders a styled badge displaying a user's role label with appropriate color classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profiles, registration, posts, comments, events, and approvals, with toast error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Poppins/Inter fonts and defining Tailwind CSS base variables, custom component classes (badges, cards, gradients), and utility classes for the app's design system.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging, role/category label formatting, badge styling, timestamp formatting, initials extraction, and role-based permission checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel page restricted to users with management roles, providing tabs for viewing/removing all members and assigning roles via a RoleAssignmentPanel component.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Authentication page component that toggles between the login view and a signup form, displaying the AnthroVerse branding.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterGrowthPage.tsx: Displays chapter analytics (member counts, pending approvals, events, posts) with role-based access control restricted to LT members and above. Renders stat cards and a GroupFeed component using data from multiple query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterMeetingPage.ts: Shows upcoming approved events and an editable meeting notes section for chapter meetings. Executive roles can edit and save notes locally via a simple inline editor.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Full events management page supporting event creation, registration, approval (for executives), and viewing registrations with payment toggling. Uses tabbed views for upcoming and pending events.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Community feed page that displays posts with filtering by category, search, and 'my posts' toggle, plus admin pending-approval panel. Supports creating, liking, approving, and deleting posts.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with a branded card UI that authenticates users via Internet Identity. Shows a loading spinner during the login process.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page allowing viewing and editing of profile fields (name, email, company, bio) and profile picture upload with progress tracking. Displays the user's role badge and their published posts.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: React page for new user profile setup, collecting name, email, and optional profile picture, then calling register and upload mutations before navigating to the home route.
frontend/src/pages/WaitingApprovalPage.t: Empty file with no content, likely a placeholder page for users awaiting admin approval.
frontend/src/utils/permissions.ts: Utility functions that check role-based permissions (e.g., isExecutiveRole, canManageUsers, canApprovePost) using the backend Role enum.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility functions for formatting bigint nanosecond timestamps into relative time strings, human-readable dates, and converting Date objects back to nanoseconds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with OKLCH/HSL color tokens, typography, border radius, shadows, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing two fix requests: correcting the registration flow to skip the approval gate, and fixing admin member removal in the admin panel.
